Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\i18n\DbMessageSource

All Classes | Properties | Methods | Events | Constants
Inheritanceyii\i18n\DbMessageSource » yii\i18n\MessageSource » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
DbMessageSource extends yii\i18n\MessageSource and represents a message source that stores translated messages in database.

The database must contain the following two tables:

CREATE TABLE tbl_source_message (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    category VARCHAR(32),
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tbl_message (
    id INTEGER,
    language VARCHAR(16),
    translation TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id, language),
    CONSTRAINT fk_message_source_message FOREIGN KEY (id)
        REFERENCES tbl_source_message (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE RESTRICT
);

The tbl_source_message table stores the messages to be translated, and the tbl_message table stores the translated messages. The name of these two tables can be customized by setting $sourceMessageTable and $messageTable, respectively.

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$forceTranslation boolean Whether to force message translation when the source and target languages are the same yii\i18n\MessageSource
$sourceLanguage string The language that the original messages are in yii\i18n\MessageSource

$messageTable string The name of the translated message table yii\i18n\DbMessageSource
$cachingDuration integer The time in seconds that the messages can remain valid in cache yii\i18n\DbMessageSource
$enableCaching boolean Whether to enable caching translated messages yii\i18n\DbMessageSource

Property Details

$db property
yii\db\Connection|string $db = 'db'

The DB connection object or the application component ID of the DB connection. After the DbMessageSource object is created, if you want to change this property, you should only assign it with a DB connection object.

$cache property
yii\caching\Cache|string $cache = 'cache'

The cache object or the application component ID of the cache object. The messages data will be cached using this cache object. Note, this property has meaning only in case $cachingDuration set to non-zero value. After the DbMessageSource object is created, if you want to change this property, you should only assign it with a cache object.

$sourceMessageTable property
string $sourceMessageTable = '{{%source_message}}'

The name of the source message table.

$messageTable property
string $messageTable = '{{%message}}'

The name of the translated message table.

$cachingDuration property
integer $cachingDuration = 0

The time in seconds that the messages can remain valid in cache. Use 0 to indicate that the cached data will never expire.

See Also

  • $enableCaching
$enableCaching property
boolean $enableCaching = false

Whether to enable caching translated messages

$behaviors property read-only
yii\base\Behavior[] getBehaviors( )

list of behaviors attached to this component

Method Details

init() method
void init( )
throws yii\base\InvalidConfigException if $db is invalid or $cache is invalid.

Initializes the DbMessageSource component.

This method will initialize the $db property to make sure it refers to a valid DB connection. Configured $cache component would also be initialized.

loadMessages() method
array loadMessages( $category, $language )
$category string The message category
$language string The target language
return array the loaded messages. The keys are original messages, and the values are translated messages.

Loads the message translation for the specified language and category.

Child classes should override this method to return the message translations of the specified language and category.

loadMessagesFromDb() method
array loadMessagesFromDb( $category, $language )
$category string The message category.
$language string The target language.
return array the messages loaded from database.

Loads the messages from database.

You may override this method to customize the message storage in the database.
